title:
JAN
ČÍŽEK
description:
Our founder, Jan Čížek, began his career in banking, holding key roles at KBC and Intesa Bank.

Since 2001, Jan has dedicated his expertise to acquiring, managing, and selling real estate projects. With over two decades of experience, today Jan manages a portfolio of 150 properties across Europe.

In 2015, Jan founded INVESTIKA, one of the Czech Republic's largest non-banking investment firms. Under his leadership, INVESTIKA manages over EUR 1 billion in fund capital, serving over 95,000 clients.

title:
TOMÁŠ
PORUPKA
description:
Tomáš Porupka is our director, bringing 25 years of experience in Corporate/M&A and Real Estate across six continents.

His career includes roles at leading international law firms and prominent investment groups in both Prague and Madrid. As a senior lawyer, Tomáš has held key positions at the Prague offices of Clifford Chance and Arthur Andersen.

Tomáš holds a Ph.D. in Czech law, complemented by a background in economics, and has also studied law in Spain.

title:
OLIVIER
LAMBRECHT
description:
Olivier Lambrecht has held senior finance roles, including as the Regional Financial Controller for Europe in the Real Estate Department of the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority and as a Senior Associate at The Carlyle Group.

His career spans over two decades, specializing in real estate and financial management. Olivier has also held leadership roles across prominent global financial institutions.

Olivier holds a degree in Management & Economics from the University of Liège in Belgium.

title:
NAIM
GJONAJ
description:
Naim brings extensive expertise in private equity, real estate, and credit portfolio management. Since 2005, he has served as a board member for holding companies in the investment and asset management industries.

His career highlights include senior roles such as Group Finance Director at Lio Factory and board member at BC Partners, where he was instrumental in M&A transactions and daily operations management. Naim holds an MBA in Finance from Sacred Heart University in Connecticut.
